title: 3D flower-like bimetallic Ni–Co metal–organic framework as an electrocatalyst for the oxygen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18367-18372
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02280G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chao Shuai, Chao Kong, Yingying Li, Liang Zhang, Caiju Qi, Zunli Mo
3D flower-like bimetallic MOF (F-Ni1Co4-BTC) was successfully designed and synthesized and exhibited excellent OER activity. Moreover, fixed on the surface of a carbon cloth, F-Ni1Co4-BTC realized high OER activity and long-term durability.
